com.bigdata.rdf.sail

Class ExportKB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.ExportKB

  • public class ExportKB
extends Object
    Utility class for exporting the configuration properties and data associated with one or more KBs on a Journal.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    Data Migration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExportKB

        public ExportKB(BigdataSail.BigdataSailConnection conn,
        File kbdir,
        org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat format,
        boolean includeInferred)
        Parameters:
        conn - The connection.
        kbdir - The directory into which the exported properties and RDF data will be written.
        format - The RDFFormat to use when exporting the data.
        includeInferred - When true inferences and axioms will also be exported. Otherwise just the explicitly given (aka told) triples/quads will be exported.

      • flatCopy

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Export one or more KBs from a Journal. The only required argument is the name of the properties file for the Journal. By default all KB instances found on the journal will be exported into the current working directory. Each KB will be written into a subdirectory based on the namespace of the KB.
        Parameters:
        args - [options] propertyFile namespace* where options is any of:
        -outdir
        The output directory (default is the current working directory)
        -format
        The RDFFormat which will be used to export the data. If not specified then an appropriate format will be selected based on the KB configuration. The default for triples or SIDs is RDFFormat.RDFXML. The default for quads is RDFFormat.TRIX.
        -includeInferred
        Normally only the told triples/quads will be exported. This option may be given to export the axioms and inferences as well as the told triples/quads.
        -n
        Do nothing, but show the KBs which would be exported.
        -help
        Display the usage message and exit.
        where propertyFile is the properties file for the Journal.
        where namespace is zero or more namespaces of KBs to export from the Journal. If no namespace is given, then all KBs on the Journal will be exported.
        Throws:
        Exception
